price: Say, “I only warn you by divine revelation.” But the deaf cannot hear the call when they are warned.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلۡوَحۡيِۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
